documents.document: Worrying will never change the outcome.
You can't live a perfect day without doing something for someone who will never be able to repay you. -John Wooden
RT @lnspire_me: We could never learn to be brave & patient, if there were only joys in the world. -Helen Keller
Bitterness is like drinking poison & waiting for the other person to die. -Steve Ostten
Laugh on. https://t.co/Fm8tPJeRy7
RT @FaithReeI: https://t.co/hbGl79Tgo5
If you have never made a mistake then it means you have never tried something new.
If you do not enjoy what you are doing, you will never be good at it. -Luke Parker
You can't change what's going on around you until you start changing what's going on within you. https://t.co/3Vr4JPQRY0
You have never really lived until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
RT @lnspireMeNow: Truth above all else. https://t.co/uBxr1MtOk2
Where you invest your love you invest your life.
Life consists not in holding good cards, but in playing those cards you hold well.
Our live are full of moments. Enjoy them. https://t.co/fgF3nu4g4n
If it is important to you, you will find a way. If it's not, you'll find an excuse.
When your mind says give up, hope whispers one more try.
RT @mother_know: It's always mom! https://t.co/RFnpekWels
No color, no religion, no nationality should come between us, we are all children of God. - Mother Teresa
It's not enough to be compassionate, you must act.
Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone. - Pablo Picasso
Good things come to those who wait. But better things come to those who work for it.
Life is to short to spend it with the wrong people. https://t.co/v0nKxCl3qv
5 rules of a relationship: 1. Stay faithful. 2. Make them feel wanted. 3. Respect your partner. 4. Don't flirt with others. 5. Make time.
It's important to give it all you have while you have the chance. -Shania Twain
Never be afraid to try something new. Remember, amateurs built the ark. Professionals built the Titanic.
Don't think outside the box. Think like there is no box

Conquer your bad habits or they will conquer you. - Rob Gilbert
Love, there is nothing stronger. https://t.co/XjTOHEhZ9A
There is no pillow so soft as a clear conscience. -French proverb
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
By becoming the answer to someone's prayer, we often find the answers to our own.
The answer lies within ourselves. If we can't find peace and happiness there, it's not going to come from the outside. - Tenzin Palmo
The more I think of it, the more I realize there are no answers. Life is to be lived. - Marilyn Monroe
RT @LittleHeadBigH: Fear can keep us up all night long, but faith makes one fine pillow. -Unknown
Sometimes you gotta create what you want to be part of. -Geri Weitzman
Work hard in silence; let success make the noise.
"So do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will take care of itself." -Matthew 6:34

Life is about laughing & living in good & bad times. Getting through whatever comes our way & looking back with a smile.

Participate in life instead of just watching it pass you by.
They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself. - Andy Warhol
The best pieces of advice. https://t.co/8dji31J2uT
You can be comfortable or courageous, but you cannot be both.
You are where you're supposed to be at this very moment. Every experience is part of God's divine plan.

Thank God for your life tonight. For your health, your family, or your home. Many people don't have these things.

Hate is not the first enemy of love. Fear is. It destroys your ability to trust.

Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer grows you.

Today is another chance to get it right.
Sometimes you gotta fall before you fly.
